effects.value: Kiosk requires a scannable badge and supervisor reference; you are missing required paperwork.
A Temporary Presence Receipt has already been issued from this kiosk.
The kiosk menu loops back to the presence/ID flow; nothing else useful is offered.
The phone list includes a still-routing line to OLEA Legal; usable as a supervisor/escalation reference.
You already requested a Work Order from Legal; calling again would only generate more disclaimers.
Most extensions dead-end; the Legal line is the only one that behaves like a real escalation path.
Asset plaque: S.P.I.N.D.L.E. Node SP-01 (already recorded).
The reception drawers look like the kind of place old badge hardware and office salvage ends up.
You already pulled anything useful from the drawers.
Miscellaneous office debris; nothing else stands out.
Envelope stack: unusually new, clean edges; separated like it expects to be used soon.
Notices wall: one barcode format is too crisp/standardized to belong with the rest.
